CreatePPTCheckTask.document: 创建PPT检测任务，识别动态转码不支持的元素列表

POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tiw.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateTranscode
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Url": "http://example.com/%E6%B5%8B%E8%AF%95.pptx",
    "SdkAppId": "1400000001"
}
CreatePPTCheckTask.title: 创建PPT检测任务

CreateSnapshotTask.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tiw.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateSnapshotTask
<公共请求参数>

{
    "COS": {
        "TargetDir": "snapshot/",
        "Region": "ap-guangzhou",
        "Bucket": "test-123070000",
        "Domain": "xxx.file.com",
        "Uin": 130001358
    },
    "Whiteboard": {
        "Width": 1280,
        "InitParams": "{\"ratio\":\"16:9\"}",
        "Height": 720
    },
    "RoomId": 12345,
    "SdkAppId": 1400123480,
    "CallbackURL": "http://xx/callback"
}
CreateSnapshotTask.title: 创建白板板书生成任务

CreateTranscode.document: 创建PPT动态转码任务，并生成分辨率为960x540的缩略图
CreateTranscode.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tiw.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateTranscode
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Url": "https://path/to/document.ppt",
    "ThumbnailResolution": "960x540",
    "SdkAppId": "1400000001"
}
CreateTranscode.title: 创建PPT动态转码任务

CreateTranscode.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tiw.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateTranscode
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Url": "https://path/to/document.ppt",
    "IsStaticPPT": "True",
    "SdkAppId": "1400000001"
}
CreateTranscode.title: 创建PPT静态转码任务
